item.title: ...and Back to Hugo Again
item.description: I switched to Nuxt not more than 2 months ago. Now, I am back to using Hugo, and intend to do so for the forseeable future.

item.title: Moving my site from Hugo to Nuxt.js...
item.description: I previously built my site using Hugo with the Academic theme. It felt restrictive, so I tried out various static site generators and chose Nuxt.js.
